settings.title: Our Story
settings.subtitle: Where timeless style meets conscious consumption

settings.heading: A Passion for the Past
settings.content:
CURATED was born from a simple belief: the most beautiful pieces have already been made. We're dedicated to giving exceptional vintage and pre-loved clothing a second life, connecting discerning shoppers with garments that tell a story.

Every item in our collection is hand-selected for its quality, condition, and timeless appeal. From rare designer finds to everyday classics, we believe in the magic of pieces that have stood the test of time.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.description: Fashion is one of the world's largest polluters. By choosing vintage and pre-loved, you're making a conscious choice to reduce waste and extend the lifecycle of beautiful garments.

settings.title: Quality
settings.description: We only source pieces that meet our rigorous standards. Every garment is inspected, authenticated when applicable, and photographed to show its true condition.

settings.title: Individuality
settings.description: In a world of fast fashion and mass production, vintage pieces offer something truly unique. Express your personal style with one-of-a-kind finds you won't see everywhere.

settings.title: Source
settings.description: We work with trusted suppliers, estates, and individual consignors to find exceptional pieces.

settings.title: Inspect
settings.description: Every item undergoes a thorough quality check and authentication process.

settings.title: Prepare
settings.description: Items are professionally cleaned and carefully photographed.

settings.title: Present
settings.description: We provide detailed descriptions, measurements, and condition notes for informed shopping.

settings.heading: Ready to Explore?
settings.description: Discover your next favorite piece in our carefully curated collection.
